original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1026)@</color>號令一群鷹隼對敵方一名體力最少的武將重複打擊 ，並以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(621)@ x 11</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成法術傷害，同時暈眩 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(129)@</color> 秒。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1026)@</color> instructs a group of eagles to repeatedly attack an enemy general with the least physical strength, and use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(621)@ x 11</color> <color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage and dizziness at the same time <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(129)@</color> second.
